title: Fix Awards & Recognition photos not displaying on About and Home pages

requirements.summary: Fix Awards & Recognition section on About page to display all 7 award photos with hardcoded src paths
acceptanceCriteria: All 7 award photos (award-photo-01, 02, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08) are visible on the About page Awards & Recognition section
Each img tag has a hardcoded literal src path '/assets/generated/award-photo-XX.jpeg' with no template literals
Each img tag has className='w-full h-48 object-cover rounded-lg' applied directly
No reference to award-photo-03.jpeg exists in the component
No conditional rendering, lazy loading, or intersection observer hides any award image
All other content on the About page (founder profile, books section) remains intact

file_operations.description: Completely rewrite the Awards & Recognition rendering block. Remove all dynamic src construction, template literals, inline event handlers, lazy loading, and conditional rendering. Replace with 7 hardcoded img elements, each with literal src='/assets/generated/award-photo-XX.jpeg' (where XX is 01, 02, 04, 05, 06, 07, or 08), className='w-full h-48 object-cover rounded-lg', wrapped in div with className='w-full overflow-hidden rounded-lg bg-gray-100'. Do not reference award-photo-03.jpeg. Preserve all other content (founder profile, books section) without modification.

Each img tag has className='w-full h-48 object-cover rounded-lg' applied directly

No conditional rendering, lazy loading, or intersection observer hides any award image
